changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE book_shop.genre ( id bigserial NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, name varchar(254) NOT NULL, ord int )
CREATE TABLE book_shop.genre_lang ( genre_id bigint NOT NULL REFERENCES book_shop.genre (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT, name public.hstore )

CREATE FUNCTION book_shop.genre(character varying DEFAULT 'en') RETURNS TABLE (id bigint, name varchar, ord int) LANGUAGE sql AS ' select g.id, coalesce(gl.name -> $1, g.name) as name, g.ord from book_shop.genre g left join book_shop.genre_lang gl on g.id = gl.genre_id; '
CREATE TABLE book_shop.author ( id bigserial NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, last_name varchar(254) NOT NULL, first_name varchar(254) NOT NULL )
